step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Try to keep your shoulders relaxed and down as you begin the roll.
Excellent! You're squeezing your shoulder blades back and down nicely. Remember to breathe deeply as you do this.
Great job completing the first rep! Focus on making the motion smooth and continuous.
Second rep is underway. Keep that relaxed posture and initiate the backward roll smoothly.
Very good! Continue the circular motion, ensuring your shoulder blades move together.
Fantastic finish to the second rep! You're maintaining good form throughout the exercise.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the shoulder rolls! Focus on keeping your shoulders relaxed and squeezing your shoulder blades back and down smoothly. Remember to inhale deeply as you roll back to maximize the benefits.
